titles.title: Duncan Plaza Homeless Disaster Relief Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide incentives for building homeless shelters in areas warranting assistance due to incidents of national significance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/30/2008--Introduced. Duncan Plaza Homeless Disaster Relief Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an enhanced low-income housing tax credit for low-income housing projects providing temporary living accommodations for homeless individuals located in areas determined by the President to warrant public assistance due to an incident of national significance.
